sections.heading: 202 through 213 of this title shall be known and may be cited as the "Public Facilities Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1983, c. 304, ยง 169, eff. Jan. 1, 1984. Amended by Laws 1986, c. 301, ยง 20, operative July 1, 1986; Laws 2013, c. 302, ยง 6, eff. Nov. 1, 2013; Laws 2019, c. 299, ยง 5, eff. Jan. 1, 2020.
